participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, eager to explore life beyond parental constraints.
participant_1.background: i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work; i have a part-time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and somewhat jaded, with a whimsical side that dreams big despite life's challenges.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.
